00036 #ifndef _LIBERROR_H_
00037         #define _LIBERROR_H_
00038 
00042         #define ERROR_LENGTH    256
00043 
00047         typedef struct {
00048                 int code; 
00049                 char reason[ERROR_LENGTH]; 
00050         } error_t;
00051 
00060         #define ERR(REASON)                                                                                                             \
00061         ERR_HANDLER(ERROR_CONTEXT, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_PRINT, ERROR_CALLBACK, REASON);
00062 
00072         #define ERROR(REASON, ...)                                                                                              \
00073         ERROR_HANDLER(ERROR_CONTEXT, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_PRINT_ALL, ERROR_CALLBACK, REASON, ##__VA_ARGS__);
00074 
00083         #define FATAL(REASON)                                                                                                   \
00084         ERR_HANDLER(ERROR_CONTEXT, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_PRINT_FATAL, ERROR_CALLBACK, REASON);
00085 
00089         #define ERROR_CONTEXT           NULL
00090 
00094         #define ERROR_TARGET            none
00095 
00099         #define ERROR_CODE                      0
00100 
00104         #define ERROR_PRINT                     liberror_simple_err
00105 
00109         #define ERROR_PRINT_ALL         liberror_simple_error
00110 
00114         #define ERROR_PRINT_FATAL       liberror_fatal_err
00115 
00119         #define ERROR_CALLBACK /* empty */
00120 
00130         #define ERR_HANDLER(CONTEXT, CODE, PRINT, CALLBACK, REASON)                             \
00131                 PRINT(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON);                                                                           \
00132                 CALLBACK;
00133 
00144         #define ERROR_HANDLER(CONTEXT, CODE, PRINT, CALLBACK, REASON, ...)              \
00145                 PRINT(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON, ##__VA_ARGS__);                                            \
00146                 CALLBACK;
00147 
00154         #define TRY(FUNCTION, HANDLER)                                                                                  \
00155         if (ERROR_CODE == (FUNCTION)) {                                                                                 \
00156                 HANDLER;                                                                                                                        \
00157         }
00158         
00165         #define ASSERT(CONDITION, HANDLER)                                                                              \
00166         if (!(CONDITION)) {                                                                                                             \
00167                 HANDLER;                                                                                                                        \
00168         }
00169         
00177         #define liberror_simple_err(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON)                                              \
00178                 liberror_simple(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON)
00179 
00188         #define liberror_simple_error(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON, ...)                               \
00189                 liberror_simple(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00190 
00198         #define liberror_complete_err(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON)                                    \
00199                 liberror_complete(CONTEXT, __func__, __FILE__, __LINE__, CODE, REASON)
00200 
00209         #define liberror_complete_error(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON, ...)                             \
00210                 liberror_complete(CONTEXT, __func__, __FILE__, __LINE__, CODE, REASON, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00211 
00219         #define liberror_fatal_err(CONTEXT, CODE, REASON)                                       \
00220                 liberror_complete(CONTEXT, __func__, __FILE__, __LINE__, CODE, "FATAL: " REASON)
00221 
00230         void liberror_simple(error_t *context, int code, const char *reason, ...);
00231 
00243         void liberror_complete(error_t *context, const char *function,
00244                 const char *file, int line, int code, const char *reason, ...);
00245 
00246 #endif /* !_LIBERROR_H_ */
